title: I'm a class 12th Commerce student. Can you provide me with a timetable that you used at your time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Develop the habit of studying more than 4–5 hours after school.Your focused should be on the Core subjects of commerce along with the other three subject to get decent score. Prepare a time table on which you can stand on ,everyone has different way of living and using his time and you have your own, so better make your time table while keeping in mind the target and motivate yourself daily to increase your efficiency …study more than 1 hour daily each subjects .Core Subjects should be focused more because of their technical nature. Accountancy-Initially go through the chapters.. learn all the rules ,theories ,procedures, terminology,of the subjects and prepare hand note so you can easily and quickly revise from it.After initial stage, solve practical questions of accounts of your text book and if time left then also try some side book.Learn and practice the treatment of each and very items.Practice is the only way to score higher .There are some topic which carry more marks,practice those topics more and more like Shares and debentures ,cash book ,contra entries,P/L account,b/s, partnership. Business studies is completely theory along with a wages numerical.Most of parts are similar and related to each other . Functions,advantages ,disadvantages should be learned. Scientific approach , Taylor’s and Henri’s theories are always important. Read the book thoroughly .Prepare the note ,mark the important topics.and revise every week what you learned earlier. Economics is reality based and market related,you will not feel bored ,read all the theories along with the diagrams which are very important to score. Focus on the numericals of GDP ,national Income,utility etc with different methods .there are some most important topics like Indifference curve,utility ,GDP,BOP,types of money viz M1,M2,M3,M4,types of market etc..there are two books micro and macro… micro is easy to learn and understand but macro takes some more time to clear the concept .so give time accordingly… Diagrams are very important…practice it and also explain the diagram well. Maths is a good subject, plays an important role and more important demands your time and effort. So , practice more and more ,understand the concept and more focus should on the lessons from which maximum marks questions comes .Last but not least.. go through the 10 previous years paper (10 not 5 because your target is big) read thoroughly ,do the Analysis properly and practice writing the answers at least all 10 years question answers and important topics.Also do the same with the other subjects. Believe in yourself and hard ans smart work which will definitely pay you off at the end.

First Work At Defining Your Goal - What is It? Is It to Score the highest or is it to score between 80–90 % ? Work Accordingly. Its always Important to focus in one direction. Just like a chariot moves when all horses run in one direction , your focus must also be towards one goal to achieve it completely. A perfect timetable cannot be made as we all have different priorities & commitments but I sure can give you some guidelines. Albert Einstein has said that COMPOUND INTEREST is the 8th Wonder Of the world. Use this principle throughly. It simply means that Working towards your goals everyday in small parts gives greater results as Compared to working towards it for hours for once in a week. ENSURE that you study everyday in every subject for atleast one chapter or set a pattern to study some part of every subject everyday. Also try Exercising even if for 15 Mins .It gives a great result in a long run. TRUST ME. Be an Early Riser. It will be difficult but it'll certainly help you to complete all your work in one day as it gives us more time compared to waking up late. Hope it Helps :)
